Name: INTERNET
Description: Allows an app to connect to the internet.
Misuse: Stealing the user's personal data, transferring the user's data to third parties without permission.

Name: ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
Description: Allows an app to access information about Wi-Fi networks.
Misuse: Tracking the user's Wi-Fi usage, manipulating the user's Wi-Fi connection.

Name: ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
Description: Allows an app to access information about the network, such as connection status and network type.
Misuse: Tracking the user's online activity, manipulating the user's network connection.

Name: VIBRATE
Description: Allows an app to vibrate the device.
Misuse: Disturbing the user with unwanted vibrations, draining the device's battery.

Name: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Description: Allows an app to write files to the device's external storage.
Misuse: Spreading malware to the user's device, modifying the user's files without permission.

Name: SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
Description: Allows an app to display an overlay on top of other apps.
Misuse: Displaying disruptive or harmful advertisements, mimicking other apps to deceive the user.

Name: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Description: Allows an app to read files from the device's external storage.
Misuse: Stealing the user's personal data, such as photos, videos, and documents.

Name: FOREGROUND_SERVICE
Description: Allows an app to create foreground services.
Misuse: Running in the background without the user's knowledge, draining the device's battery.

Name: WAKE_LOCK
Description: Allows an app to prevent the device from going to sleep.
Misuse: Draining the device's battery, disrupting the user's sleep.

Name: RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
Description: Allows an app to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.
Misuse: Starting malicious services after the device boots, running in the background without the user's knowledge.
